title: Supreme Court’s green light for President’s Entitlements Repeal Bill
byline: The Supreme Court has held that the President’s Entitlements Repeal Bill, which seeks to abolish certain privileges of former Presidents, is in accordance with the Constitution and can be passed by a simple majority, Speaker Jagath Wickramaratne announced in Parliament today.

title: France in fresh political crisis after MPs oust prime minister
byline: France has been plunged into a new political crisis with the defeat of Prime Minister François Bayrou at a confidence vote in the National Assembly.

title: Police to introduce body-worn cameras for all traffic officers
byline: In a bid to promote accountability on the roads, the Sri Lanka Police will soon begin issuing body-worn cameras to all traffic officers to improve transparency and reduce misconduct during public interactions.

title: Nepal lifts social media ban after 19 killed in protests
byline: Nepal has lifted a social media ban after it led to clashes between protesters and police that have left at least 19 people dead.
